flawed_nl_solution:
After giving away 4/5 of the cupcakes, Anna has 60 / 5 = <<60/5=21.0>>21.0 cupcakes
After eating 3 cupcakes, Anna has 21.0 - 3 = <<21.0-3=18.0>>18.0 cupcakes.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12.0, not 21.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
